metadata.title: CVE-2022-20484 on Ubuntu 20.04 ESM (focal) - medium
metadata.description: In NotificationChannel of NotificationChannel.java, there is a possiblefailure to persist permissions settings due to resource exhaustion. Thiscould lead to local escalation of privilege with no additional executionprivileges needed. User interaction is not needed for exploitation.Product:AndroidVersions: Android-10 Android-11 Android-12 Android-12LAndroid-13Android ID: A-242702851

criterions.comment: android-platform-frameworks-base package in esm-apps/focal is affected and may need fixing.
